article_title: Carnival ride inspections can be a wild ride
article_text:
Current Online Subscribers

If you have previously registered on tdtnews.com, and have a current online subscription you may login with your email and password. Online subscribers get access to all of the Temple Daily Telegram's online content, plus a digital replica of the print edition. Some third party content, including circulars may not be available online.

If you have questions regarding access, please contact circulation at tdtcir@tdtnews.com or 254-778-4444 between 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. Monday through Friday.

og.description: It is typically balloons and cotton candy, rides and games on the midway and funnel cakes and music when the carnival comes to town. However, things can go from magic to tragic in an instant.In 2012, the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission estimated that about 44,000 people received injuries from amusement attractions, including carnival rides. The agency based the estimate on 1,239 reported injuries at 96 hospitals nationwide.
